name: Canyon Commando
description:
One man...

One gun....    (didnt have time for more:)

And hords of enemies!

Find your way through the canyon, and defeat the ultimate Boss!

WSAD - move

Left Click - Fire

Right Click - Grenade

Space - Medkit

Art and sound is created by me or by amazing people at opengameart.org:

lots of tiles, enemies and objects thanks to - https://opengameart.org/users/cobralad

explosions - https://opengameart.org/users/diamonddmgirl

shotgun - https://opengameart.org/users/miguelangel98s

hit sound - https://opengameart.org/users/qubodup

explosion, and shot sound - https://opengameart.org/users/calinou

Game created for Linux Game Jam 2022 with Godot on linux ;)

Enjoy!
